name: NoGrav-19
description:
This is a game about saving people.

You need to save everyone and overcome 365 days to win.

Try to make as many combos as possible, so you get more points and recover your energy.

Theme: Upside down

I think the theme fits in different ways in this game, upside down because people lose their gravity, but also upside down by the way many people react to new problems that arise in the world, it's all upside down ...

Note: Gravity weapons make weird noises.

Music by SubspaceAudio 

link: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action 

his Youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3wdbuL350fQVtBfWd6hErA
